message:
Dear {{hr_manager or "HR Manager"}},

The Reporting Manager {{ manager }} has {{ workflow_state }} a {{ doc.leave_type }} request. Please find the details below:

{% set employee = frappe.get_doc("Employee",doc.employee) %} Employee Details:
- Name: {{ doc.employee_name }}
- Employee ID: {{ employee.employee_number }}

Leave Details:
- Leave Type: {{ doc.leave_type }}
{% if doc.doctype == "Compensatory Leave Request" %} - Compensatory Work Period: {{frappe.utils.format_date(doc.work_from_date,"dd-MM-yyyy") }} to {{ frappe.utils.format_date(doc.work_end_date,"dd-MM-yyyy") }}
{% else %} - Leave Period: {{ frappe.utils.format_date(doc.from_date, "dd-MM-yyyy") }} to {{ frappe.utils.format_date(doc.to_date, "dd-MM-yyyy") }}
{% endif %} - Current Status: {{ doc.workflow_state }}

Request Link: View Request

{% if doc.workflow_state == "Approved by Reporting Manager" %} As this request has been Approved by the Reporting Manager, it is now pending your action.

{% endif %} Thank you,
HR System
name: Leave Request Status Update to HR Manager
subject: Manager has {{ workflow_state }} a {{request_type}}
